alert.note: Alert for Etowah; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:31PM CDT until July 09 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Etowah County in northeastern Alabama... Northeastern St. Clair County in central Alabama... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Altoona, or 10 miles west of Attalla, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Rainbow City, Attalla, Hokes Bluff, Glencoe, Ashville, Ragland, Steele, Altoona, Walnut Grove, Reece City, Gadsden Mall, Neely Henry Lake, Southside, Whitney Junction, Alabama International Dragway, Gadsden Steam Plant, I 59 Rest Areas At Oneonta, Cobb City and Ramsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
